description: Numerators of a continued fraction for (3+sqrt(13))/2.
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Jeffrey Shallit, Predictable regular continued cotangent expansions, J. Res. Nat. Bur. Standards Sect. B 80B (1976), no. 2, 285-290.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
